title: Church in Sidi Khiribech
description: Ruins of a church likely built around the fifth century AD, on the summit of the low hill of Sidi Khiribech in Berenike. The character of the building and its position has suggested to some archaeologists a defensive as well as a religious purpose.

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the ruins of an Early Christian Church (also known as "Area G"), in the archaeological site of Sidi Khiribech, in Berenike (modern Benghazi).
properties.title: OSM location of the Early Christian Church in Sidi Khiribech (Berenike)
